remark.line: Let us know if things don't work as smoothly as you might expect

header.line: You can use the openamq.org mailing lists for discussion.
Or, use our bug tracking system to report problems.

section.title: Mailing Lists
section.head: openamq-help@lists.openamq.org
section.line: For all questions about using the OpenAMQ software, libraries, and components.
section.head: openamq-dev@lists.openamq.org
section.line: For developers of the OpenAMQ product and standards.

section.title: Bug Tracking System
section.head: www.changeflow.com by iMatix
section.line: For all issues that need formal change management.
Restricted to users with authorised access.
